title: Walking through Istanbul is magical

Why I went: I wanted to see this vibrant city, a mix of the modern and ancient. I stayed with a friend who has lived there for two years. Janet Navilhon, of Pleasant Hill, standing in front of the Harem at the Topkapi Palace. Janet Navilhon, of Pleasant Hill, standing in front of the Harem at...
Why I went: I wanted to see this vibrant city, a mix of the modern and ancient. I stayed with a friend who has lived there for two years.
